Hey, I'm Caz!

I'm the owner, founder and face of CazFit, and it's so nice to meet you.

To me personal training is more than just the training itself. It is about establishing healthy relationships with my clients and being part of their journey. It brings me so much joy seeing my clients enjoy their exercise sessions. Ontop of personal training sessions and FUNctional group exercise sessions, I also specialize in safe exercise for seniors, pregnant women and children. I also work as a group exercise instructor at Virgin Active and I am co owner of FitTogether.

Book a Session

My programmes.

Personal Training
(Pregnancy training too)

Focusing on weight loss, flexibility, core strength, toning and overall fitness. Perfect if you need motivation.

Senior Fitness
(PT and GROUP)

Maintain strength and bone density, post knee replacement rehabilitation, flexibility, balance and coordination.

Youth & Childrens Fitness (PT and GROUP)

Let's get your kids active! Focusing on agility, balance, coordination, flexibility & muscular endurance.

Eating Plans
yum!

Delicious eating plans to support your fitness journey.
I do Ketogenic eating plans too.

Don't forget to breathe.

My Studio.

My studio is wherever you are! As personal trainer opporating in Upper Highway area, I am flexible and able to come to your door to offer you the best and personalised services.

I also have my own personal training studio in Hillcrest that is well kitted out for clients who workout better in a different environment

  • Personal training at your home
  • Group training in Hillcrest
  • Personal training in Hillcrest
  • Meal plans for the Upper Highway community

Find me. Contact me.
